channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for UT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for UT

item.title: Report X-2023100980
item.description:
Report X-2023100980

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-10
  • City: NORTH SALT LAKE
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: LEAKING FLAMMABLE LIQUID DURING TRANSIT, UNLOADED, PLACED INSIDE A HAZMAT BAG AND RED HAZMAT TOTE. DescribePack: LOOSE CAP LEAKING FLAMMABLE LIQUID SOILING THE BOX AND ALL CONTENTS INSIDE. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PLACED INSIDE A HAZMAT BAG AND RED HAZMAT TOTE.

item.title: Report X-2023100815
item.description:
Report X-2023100815

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-15T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-08
  • City: NORTH SALT LAKE
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Driver noticed that a hazmat package that was loaded into his truck had a wet spot and was leaking. I came and pulled the hazmat from the truck and placed it in a hazardous red tote and brought it to the QA cage to process the damaged hazmat. DescribePack: Liquid leaked from the lid on bottle. You can see the streaks on the outside of the bottle left from the liquid. Upon inspection the lid was secured on the bottle which points to the lid being possibly defective. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Put in a hazardous red tote and brought to the QA cage to be processed.
